name: controlspending-expense-tracker
description: Contextual AI Expense Tracker with smart features and gamification

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push

author: Your Name
